mapper.select: SELECT cu.username as username, cu.firstname as firstname, cu.lastname as lastname, cu.email as email, cg.name as groupname, cs.site_id as siteid, cs.name as sitename from cstudio_user cu LEFT JOIN cstudio_usergroup cug on cu.username = cug.username LEFT JOIN cstudio_group cg on cug.groupId = cg.id LEFT JOIN cstudio_site cs on cg.site_id=cs.id WHERE cu.username = #{username}

SELECT DISTINCT cu.username as username FROM cstudio_user cu LEFT JOIN cstudio_usergroup cug on cu.username = cug.username LEFT JOIN cstudio_group cg on cug.groupId = cg.id LEFT JOIN cstudio_site cs on cg.site_id=cs.id ORDER BY username LIMIT #{start}, #{number}
